Caption: The dignitaries on the dais stand for the invocation before the commencement of the event
Description: The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. The chief guest for the event was Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications). In the image the dignitaries on the dais stand for the Invocation. From left, Mr. Srinivasan (PTI), Mr. R. Natarajan (Registrar), Dr. Werner Koch, Dr. P. Subbarayan, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors), Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and Prof. D. Venkateswarlu (Chemical Engineering)
